itunes:title: Episode 664 - The Kenosha Wisconsin Riots
title: Episode 664 - The Kenosha Wisconsin Riots
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the riots in Kenosha, Wisconsin and whether or not the shooting of Jacob Blake was justified, why people should wait for the full facts to decide to riot, and why the 17 year old shooter Kyle Rittenhouse who killed...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the riots in Kenosha, Wisconsin and whether or not the shooting of Jacob Blake was justified, why people should wait for the full facts to decide to riot, and why the 17 year old shooter Kyle Rittenhouse who killed 2 people should not have been out in the streets in the first place.

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the riots in Kenosha, Wisconsin and whether or not the shooting of Jacob Blake was justified, why people should wait for the full facts to decide to riot, and why the 17 year old shooter Kyle Rittenhouse who killed 2 people should not have been out in the streets in the first place.
